updateElements.mainHeader: Your MacBook requires a security update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from Balto's IT team
updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 60-70 minutes to complete
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date macOS is required to ensure that Balto IT can accurately protect and support your Mac, so your device can continue to provide you with the best user experience possible every day.

This update must be installed on your Mac prior to Monday, February 13th at 5:00pm CT. If you do not update your Mac prior to the installation deadline, you will lose access to applications necessary for your day-to-day tasks until it is installed.

To begin the install now, simply click the "Install Update Now" button above and follow the provided steps. To schedule a reminder to install later, click "I Understand" or "Defer" below.
